project_path.UniswapV2Pair: contracts/CrowdFi Full Smart Contract Security Audit/UniswapV2Pair

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function Airdrop() uses a loop to airdrop amounts to addresses from a list and may be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the list is too long.
